#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t term,
                                uint64_t candidate_id,
                                uint64_t lastLogIndex,
                                uint64_t lastLogTerm,
                                // uint64_t* voterTerm,
                                // bool_t* vote_granted,
                                std::function<void(uint64_t, bool_t)> func) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {


    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [func](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        uint64_t voterTerm;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> voterTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        /* process the RPC response here */
        // Log_info("SendRequestVote:: Setting the voterTerm %d and vote_granted: %d", voterTerm, vote_granted);
        func(voterTerm, vote_granted);
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidate_id, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::sendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                      siteid_t site_id,
                                      uint64_t term,
                                      uint64_t leader_id,
                                      uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                      uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                      uint64_t leaderCommitIndex,
                                      // uint64_t* appenderTerm,
                                      // uint64_t* agreementIndex,
                                      // uint64_t* appender_id,
                                      // bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                      std::function<void(uint64_t, uint64_t, uint64_t, bool_t)> func) {
Log_debug("commo::sendEmptyAppendEntries");
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      
      fuattr.callback = [site_id, prevLogIndex, func](Future* fu) {
        // Log_debug("loc_id = %d inside callback for commo::sendEmptyAppendEntries", *appender_id);
        uint64_t appenderTerm;
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        // fu->get_reply() >> appender_id;
        // fu->get_reply() >> agreementIndex;
        fu->get_reply() >> appenderTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
        // Log_debug("2. loc_id = %d inside callback for commo::sendEmptyAppendEntries", appender_id);
        func(prevLogIndex, site_id, appenderTerm, followerAppendOK);
      };
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, leader_id, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      // MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
   
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t term,
                                  uint64_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  logEntry entries,
                                  uint64_t leaderCommitIndex,
                                  // uint64_t* appenderTerm,
                                  // uint64_t* agreementIndex,
                                  // uint64_t* appender_id,
                                  // bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                   std::function<void(uint64_t, uint64_t, uint64_t, bool_t)> func) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [site_id, prevLogIndex, func](Future* fu) {
        uint64_t appenderTerm;
        bool_t followerAppendOK;
        // fu->get_reply() >> agreementIndex;
        // fu->get_reply() >> appender_id;
        fu->get_reply() >> appenderTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
        // Log_debug("appender_id = %d followerAppendOK = %d", appender_id, followerAppendOK);
        func(prevLogIndex, site_id, appenderTerm, followerAppendOK);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      MarshallDeputy md(entries.cmdValue);
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, term, leader_id, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, entries.term, md, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
